name: Dillon Francis
description: '''Dillon Hart Francis''' (born October 5, 1987), also known as '''DJ Hanzel''', is an American [[electronic music]] [[Record producer|producer]] and [[Disc jockey|DJ]]. He played a key role in popularizing [[moombahton]] and later developed its heavier variants, moombahcore and [[EDM trap (music)|EDM trap]].
